entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: S 46 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
